ost_step.1: Tom was playing tennis on Tuesday but not Thursday (Condition I).

direct_answer.text:
Based on condition I alone we cannot determine if it rained or snowed yesterday because no information about weather is provided directly related to tomorrow’s weather within this specific hint. Weather typically would need data over several consecutive days rather than just one isolated instance such as 'Tom played tennis'. To accurately predict whether it might rain or snow based solely on someone being outdoors like playing tennis requires additional meteorological context which isn't supplied here. Thus, without further details regarding local climate patterns, seasonal expectations, regional atmospheric behavior, etc., any forecast made under these circumstances would merely represent speculation. Please provide supplementary climatic factors so predictions can become substantiated assumptions rooted in scientific understanding pertaining specifically to your area of interest.
